channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Achieving zomgscale with Celluloid and JRuby!"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Achieving zomgscale with Celluloid and JRuby!"

item.title: Suggestion from the proposer
item.description: Hey John, thanks for commenting. You made some good points and I'll feed that back in to the proposal now.

item.title: Suggestion from John Pagonis (@)
item.description:
Is this talk going to show-off Celluloid on CRuby/YARV vs JRuby or will it address other VMs as well?

There seem to be too much good stuff on your proposal which may be too for 30mins presentation + 15mins QA. Perhaps discussing about the GVL issue vs JRuby'simplementation is unecessary if what you are trying to achieve is to present Celluloid and the actor-based way of programming in Ruby.
